page.title: 01General Information
page.content: The area in this block is mainly farm land, with housing, shops and industry concentrated in the north west. Running north to south is the main A23 road from London to Brighton and parallel approximatly 200m. east is the main railway line. The M23 motorway lies 2.5 kilometres further east. Housing is typical 'linear' development on each side of the A23, with the industrial estates on the east. Many of the Salfords village community are involved with the church and associated organisations.The industrial workforce comes from surrounding areas. There are 8 farms in the area,most with dairy herds. There are several hotels and guest houses.
